name: 盧宗成
objective: 本課程的目的在學習各種運籌系統分析的模式與方法，主要分別從供給面與需求面探討運籌系統，並且探討供給與需求之間的均衡分析。課程內容包含：網路設計、分析與最佳化、等候理論、網路均衡指派、動態網路分析、以及商用車輛營運管理與車輛路線問題等。
schedule:
Week　　Topic
1　　Introduction
2　　Ch1 Logistics and the Supply Chain
3　　Ch4 Demand Management, Order Management and Customer Service
4　　Ch7 Transportation Management
5　　Ch8 Distribution Center, Warehouse, and Plant Location
6　　Ch9 Inventory Management
7　　Ch10 Warehousing Management
8　　Ch11 Procurement
9　　Midterm Exam/Report 
10　　Graph Theory and Network Representations
11　　Computational Complexity
12　　Shortest Path Problem (SPP)
13　　Arc Routing Problem – Chinese Postman Problem 
14　　Node Routing Problem – Traveling Salesman Problem 
15　　Node Routing Problem – Vehicle Routing Problem 
16　　Facility Location Problem
17　　Final Report 
18　　Final Exam
